#summary Module "binary"

= Binary module =

Defined in files `binary.js` and `binary.so`/`binary.dll`/`binary.dylib`.

== Binary/B ==

This module aims to implement CommonJS Binary/B specification. So far, the following is done:

  * exports.Binary
  * exports.!ByteString
  * exports.!ByteArray
  * !ByteString::length, codeAt, get, byteAt, valueAt, toString, toSource
  * !ByteString::slice, substring, substr
  * !ByteString::indexOf, lastIndexOf with first argument being only Number
  * !ByteArray::length, codeAt, get, byteAt, valueAt, toString, toSource
  * !ByteArray::slice
